name: ui-test-seed
description: Template for UI test automation project, using CucumberJS and Selenium3

scripts.test: cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require support/**/*.js --require step_definitions/**/*.js --format progress --format json:cucumber.json --format-options "{\"colorsEnabled\": true}"

author: Laszlo Szikszai <laszlo_szikszai@epam.com>
